channel.title: MMMg on LS | Papermod
channel.description: Recent content in MMMg on LS | Papermod

item.title: The Varied Pedo Destinies of 6 Young Girls
item.description: This is episode 47, and the pedo ring series is drawing to an end (will be 50). Here, several threads of the series are brought together, and the destinies of all of the lovely underage girl characters and their adult molesters are unfolding. This episode can be read alone, but check out 'The Pedo Ring Series Summary Of Episodes' under my author name, englishperv, if you want the fuller picture.

item.title: Man Number Eight for 10yo Hannah
item.description: This is story 34 in the Ring series. Sean (35) was the original character, living with a useless single Mum, Michelle, his whole purpose being the complete sexual molesting of her attractive 10yo daughter, Hannah. Since then, 7 other men have got involved with her, and 3 other girls have featured in the ring.

item.title: Little Slave Girl Hannah
item.description: This is story 20 in the Pedophile Ring series. 9yo Hannah yesterday came back from her holiday with her 32yo schoolteacher/abuser, Dan. Sean and his hard-edged pedo buddy, Simon, used that time for a quick abduction and rape of 'fresh' 10yo Abigail, stepgranddaughter of Bill (the 3rd of Hannah's abusers). Today, all 4 men are round at Sean's for 'an evening of Hannah'.

item.title: Fun And Games With Young Hannah
item.description: This is part 14 of the Pedophile Ring series. Hannah is a brunette, pale and pretty, who has been systematically sexually molested for 18 months by her mother's live-in boyfriend, 35yo Sean. Recently he has brought in Dan, her 32yo schoolteacher and an old friend of his, 65yo Bill, to enjoy the fun. Tonight, Bill has suggested some 'fun and games', having brought along some interesting props.

item.title: Hannah, Your Third Man Is Here
item.description: '...and he wants you, very much, because you're a child, you're a girl, and you're pretty, and he is a pedophile'. This is the 12th part of the Pedophile Ring series. Characters: Hannah (9yo); her stepfather Sean (35yo); her teacher Dan (32yo), and now...

item.title: 9-Year-Old Hannah Worries About Meeting Man
item.description: This is part 11 in the Pedophile Ring series but can be enjoyed sepsrately. Sean is a 35yo guy who lives with a single Mum, but only because she has a pretty daughter, Hannah. Her 32yo schoolteacher, Daniel Hall, became complicit in the fun recently. Then Dan persuaded Sean to invite an old friend into the fold.

item.title: A Third Man For Little Hannah
item.description: This is the 10th part of the Paedophile Ring series. Sean is a 35yo guy who lives with a single Mum, but only - aghem - because she has a pretty 9yo daughter. Hannah's 32yo school teacher, Daniel Hall, has got involved recently too.
